title: Love by the Book
description: Love + Imaginary Man = Mayhem ...Meet Megan, a manicurist by day and Avon salesgirl by night. After losing her job at Lucy Lu’s Salon, she escapes her real world troubles by burying herself in a romantic novel. But soon the fictional hero seems more genuine than the world around her and Megan is questioning the line between fact and fairytale. A nosy roommate and an angry cat also join forces to wreak a little havoc in Megan’s love life. Can she sort out fact from fantasy before her true hero slips away forever?* * *Other books in the Contemporary Fairytales Beastly BeautifulThe Magic A Novella
author: Dara England
